alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:11AM CDT until April 01 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CALHOUN...PONTOTOC AND LEE COUNTIES... At 111 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trace State Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Pontotoc, Verona, Trace State Park, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Shannon, Plantersville, Randolph, Troy, Furrs, Nettleton, Sherman, Algoma, Robbs, Endville, Cherry Creek, Chiwapa, Mooreville and Eggville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
